name: Stone of Speech
description:
First contact with aliens!!! But we don't understand them. That's because you go in a dungeon and search the three pieces of the Stone of Speech. On this stone is the same text in maya-language and alien-language.

But be aware, in the dungeon are the aliens. You don't lose a life, but the alien take you to the entzrance of the pyramid and you must begin at the start.

Game-Idea by Rebohm
